retail_investor_questions.description: Compares the performance of different ETFs or mutual funds.
example_questions: How has the SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) performed compared to the Vanguard Total Stock Market ETF (VTI) over the past year?
Compare the performance of the Fidelity Contrafund (FCNTX) to the T. Rowe Price Growth Stock Fund (PRGFX) over the last five years.

retail_investor_questions.description: Analyzes the expense ratios of different ETFs or mutual funds.
example_questions: What are the expense ratios of the iShares MSCI Emerging Markets ETF (EEM) and the Vanguard FTSE Emerging Markets ETF (VWO)?
How do the expense ratios of the Schwab U.S. Large-Cap ETF (SCHX) and the SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) compare?

retail_investor_questions.description: Examines the sector allocation of different funds and its impact on performance.
example_questions: What is the sector allocation of the Invesco QQQ Trust (QQQ), and how does it affect its performance?
How does the sector exposure of the Vanguard Health Care Fund (VGHCX) compare to that of the Fidelity Select Health Care Portfolio (FSPHX)?

retail_investor_questions.description: Evaluates the yield and dividend income from various funds.
example_questions: What is the dividend yield of the iShares iBoxx $ Investment Grade Corporate Bond ETF (LQD)?
How does the yield of the Vanguard High Dividend Yield ETF (VYM) compare to the Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF (SCHD)?

retail_investor_questions.description: Assesses the risk level associated with different funds or ETFs.
example_questions: What is the risk level of investing in the ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK) compared to the SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY)?
How volatile has the iShares Russell 2000 ETF (IWM) been compared to the Vanguard Total Bond Market ETF (BND)?

retail_investor_questions.description: Provides insights into the performance and strategy of fund managers.
example_questions: Who manages the T. Rowe Price Blue Chip Growth Fund (TRBCX), and what is their investment strategy?
What is the track record of the fund manager for the Fidelity Magellan Fund (FMAGX)?

retail_investor_questions.description: Assesses thematic ETFs or funds based on specific trends or sectors.
example_questions: How has the Global X Robotics & Artificial Intelligence ETF (BOTZ) performed in the context of current technology trends?
What are the recent performance trends for the Invesco Solar ETF (TAN), and how does it reflect the growth in renewable energy?
